timeline.bodyText: I think setting we want to set the maven directory in createDefaultRepositorySystemSession to keep the returned session read-only.
timeline.author: suztomo

replies.bodyText:
I'm not sure that's necessary. Is there some reason it has to be read-only?
I did try setting it here, but the extra code to configure it from the test was even uglier since DependencyGraphBuilderIntegrationTest doesn't directly access RepositoryUtility.
replies.author: elharo

replies.bodyText: OK. Then this current code is good.
replies.author: suztomo

timeline.bodyText: Now this test passes. Thank you.
timeline.author: suztomo

timeline.message: remove use of @Beta Guava method and expand JavaDoc
